resource.title: Multi-Platform "True Net" Calculator
resource.description: Excel/Google Sheets calculator that exposes the true net profit after platform commissions, helping you compare Airbnb, Agoda, and Booking.com earnings.
resource.painPoint: Hosts treat all revenue equally, ignoring that Agoda/Booking often invoice commissions later or have hidden "merchant model" fees, whereas Airbnb deducts upfront.
keyFeatures: Platform Selectors: Toggle between Airbnb, Agoda, Booking.com strategies
Commission Logic: Auto-calculates distinct fee structures (e.g., Agoda's "Sell-Inclusive" vs "Net-Inclusive")
"Take Home" Comparison: Side-by-side view of net profit for a $100 booking on each platform

specifics: GST thresholds integrated for accurate tax estimation
INR currency with rupee symbol formatting
